author: markt
msg: Avoid NPE reported in https://bz.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=57749 and log the exception.

author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-7285: ActionThrottle will not pause if getNanoTime first returns 0.

author: covener
msg: Remove some instances where a RewriteBase must be specified
Previously, any time you used a relative substitution in
per-directory/htaccess context, you needed to specify
a RewriteBase. But in case where the context document root
and context prefix are known via e.g. mod_userdir
or mod_alias, and the substitution is under the context
document root, we can determine the replacement automatically.
This makes htaccess files or config snippets a bit more

author: radu
msg: SLING-4538 - Content loaders cannot be ignored any more
* made sure to take into account individual path configurations for ignoring content loaders
* downgraded to commons-lang 2.4 (code does not seem to be using specific 2.6 features)
